EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2019-03-27 Multicloud.Thanks for joining us - Yes to Free copy
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for joining {{my.Webinar Title:default=Our Webinar}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for joining our webinar on {{my.Webinar Title:default=The Webinar}}.
You can watch it again on-demand here <[[https://turbonomic.com/thx-multicloud-containers-beyond/]]>.
As promised, here you can find your free copy of the 2019 State of Multicloud Report. <[[https://turbonomic.com/?page_id=68049&preview=true]]>
If you have any additional questions about how Turbonomic can help your IT organization optimize for performance, cost, and compliance in real-time, please feel free to schedule a meeting with us <[[https://turbonomic.com/request-a-demo/]]>.
We hope you enjoy the recording! -Team Turbonomic
